title: Parallelism
content: Our speaker puts his hope in extending languages we use today, in addition to playing with new languages, in order to solve challenges involved in coding for multiple cores.C++ can be extended with templates to program familiar tasks (not threads).  Maybe this will help with higher languages written in C++?Multicore programming will increasingly become a fact of life, as simply cranking up the clock on the one CPU isn't helping as much any more.
author: Kirby Urner
